name: Project_0: A Favour
description:
Project_0: A Favour, is the first part of a three-part story set in a mysterious world filled with weird favors & puzzles to help them "understand more, stuff".
Find and use ID's to control objects in the levels to solve the puzzles that you are faced with and progress in both the levels and the story.
And don't worry, you can still go back to past levels if you miss something.

Features
  • Sub-Puzzles:
    Sub-Puzzles are puzzles that are only solvable with the information from multiple levels. So if you find a paper that doesn't match anything, don't worry, it will, eventually.
  • Story:
    Piece together a story by finding "story papers" about different people that went through the same thing that you are going through right now, and their insights of the world that you have been placed in.
